body: Static electric and magnetic fields; solutions to static field problems, Maxwell's equations; electromagnetic waves; boundary conditions; engineering applications.(Credits: 4)(Prerequisites: NONE)(Additional Attributes: Honors)

title: EE 330H: Engineering Electromagnetics
